items.headline: ‘The house has quadrupled in value’: I bought a house with my brother. He never contributed. How do I remove him?

items.headline: Amy Schumer buys a Manhattan apartment for $6.25 million, then officially files for ‘amicable’ divorce from Chris Fischer
